DocAttribute.Name: PartOfComplexTemplate
DocAttribute.Documentation: Reference to a complex property templates. It should only be provided, if the _PropertyType_ of the referenced complex property template is set to <small>COMPLEX</small>.

DocAttribute.Name: PartOfPsetTemplate
DocAttribute.Documentation: Reference to the _IfcPropertySetTemplate_ that defines the scope for the _IfcPropertyTemplate_. A single _IfcPropertyTemplate_ can be defined within the scope of zero, one or many _IfcPropertySetTemplate_'.
